title: icopress

content: QuoteThis raffle was initiated at the request of klarki, he asked to raffle among users a custom cold wallet that was intended for him.Taking this opportunity, I also want to announce that tomorrow, March 26, a poker series will begin in which only forum users participate.The series consists of 4 games and a final game (every Sunday starting March 26). In addition to the cash prize, all participants in the final game will receive a collectible item (Icarus) as a gift, and the winner will receive a Custom Cold Wallet in addition to everything. See you at the game!Thread: ü¶ä Betnomi.com üîê Icarus Poker Series | Discussion ThreadSummary:I reserve the right to ignore any participant for any reason.You can take two slots if you play poker with me.After I choose a block, the last symbol of the hash will determine the winner.00 - Willi01 - hZti02 - GazetaBitcoin03 - Darker4504 - famososMuertos05 - Woodie06 - Steeley07 - darxiaomi08 - HedgeFx09 - Real-Duke10 - Eternad11 - Mitchell12 - julerz1213 - bitcoinbass14 - montreal115 - PeakDK16 - Soonandwaite17 - m201718 - Inagame19 - Maus072820 - Sunny21 - Pmalek22 - phishead23 - sam0024 - Becassine25 - 26 - 27 - bullrun2020bro28 - iwantmyhomepaidwithbtc229 - ajiz13830 - F2b31 - NeuroticFish32 - Ryu_Ar133 - summonerrk34 - TitanGEL35 - 36 - GxSTxV37 - Dernoste38 - 39 - Mbitr40 - tweetious41 - AHOYBRAUSE42 - salad daging43 - Inwestour44 - mendace45 - 46 - Nara189247 - 48 - MCVXYZ49 - 50 - shasan51 - 52 - aoluain53 - Dunnerjunge54 - 55 - 5tift56 - 2stout57 - 58 -59 - Asuspawer0960 - darxiaomi61 - bitdexter62 - Danydee63 - Krogoth64 - HeRetiK65 - bullrun2020bro66 - kryptowerk67 - Bitcoinislife0968 - Remsjack69 - bestcoin_5970 - Dcarter71 - owlcatz72 - MCVXYZ73 - FattCatt74 - Amax75 - minerjones76 - MoparMiningLLC77 - Dimonstration78 - Crypto Library79 - Crytocanuk80 - YodasRedRocket81 - CoinageMint82 - Aikidoka83 - haloxon84 - Koal-8485 - 86 - kryptowerk87 - bitbollo88 - Buchi-8889 - Lillominato8990 - BG91 - Streissi92 - 93 - 94 - 95 - Cantsay96 - entebah97 - JanEmil98 - famososMuertos99 - StedsmGood luck everyone! Hope your number wins! ¬†Note: Delivery to Russia, Belarus, Antarctica cannot be carried out.
